lead_paragraph: BOULOGNE--Robert. Robert Edward Boulogne, was born August 26, 1957, in Montclair, NJ, to parents Robert and Margaret Boulogne. Bobby's homecoming to his eternal home, July 11, 2016 was proceeded by his battle with Melanoma. The legacy that Bobby has left for all was his ability to build, maintain and grow long term quality friendships. A gift to anyone who had the privilege of friendship with Bobby. Bobby's kind, genuine, fun, talented, wise and God fearing character blessed all who knew him. Please visit www.sparkman-hillcrest.com for full obituary and service information. 1/3
